text: This is an alphabetical list of Airports in Canada. ==A== * Abbotsford International Airport ==B== * Burlington Airpark ==C== * Calgary International Airport (Alberta) https://www.yyc.com ==M== * Mirabel International Airport (Quebec) * Montreal-Dorval International Airport (Quebec) ==O== * Ottawa International Airport (Ontario) ==S== * St. John's International Airport ==T== * Toronto Pearson International Airport ==V== * Vancouver International Airport ==W== * Waterloo International Airport * Winnipeg James Armstrong Richardson International Airport (manitoba)https://www.waa.ca ==References== * Airports Canada
title: List of airports in Canada
